description: WellnessMate schedules a recurring weekly check‑in meeting for employee E12345 after retrieving their latest wellness survey and fitness‑tracker data, generates a personalized plan, and sends a reminder notification.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an employee‑focused AI companion that aggregates wellness survey responses, fitness‑tracker data, and mental‑health resources to create personalized wellness programs, schedule activities, and send gentle nudges.
Hi WellnessMate, could you set up a weekly 30‑minute check‑in meeting on Thursdays at 4 pm to review my wellness plan progress?
Sure, I’ll first pull your most recent wellness survey and fitness‑tracker data so I can tailor the meeting agenda.

Thanks for waiting! I’ve combined your survey answers and fitness metrics to draft a short progress summary and a personalized weekly wellness plan. I’ll now schedule the recurring Thursday‑at‑4 pm check‑in and set a reminder notification for you.

arguments.message: Your weekly Wellness Check‑in is scheduled for Thursdays at 4 pm. A reminder will be sent 15 minutes before each session.

messages.content: {"weekly_plan":{"Monday":"30‑min guided meditation","Wednesday":"20‑min HIIT workout","Friday":"Read stress‑management article"}}

All set! Your weekly Wellness Check‑in is now scheduled for every Thursday at 4 pm (first one on Nov 14). You’ll receive a gentle reminder 15 minutes before each session, and I’ve added a simple plan for the week based on your recent data. Let me know if you’d like to adjust anything or add more resources.
